title: No Nintendo Switch Pro? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.17.20
description:
Greg and Bless talk about Doug Bowser's #NintendoSwitchPro comments, #Cyberpunk2077's continued woes, and more!

00:00:00 - Start
00:10:00 - Housekeeping
PSILY XOXO is recording this Friday and it’s the PSILY AWARDS so go over to kindafunny.com/psawards and write in with your picks for the Best Of in PlayStation in 2020.
Gamescast is up from yesterday -- Cyberpunk thoughts with Parris.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:14:00 - No Switch Pro? Russ Frushtick @ Polygon talking to President of NOA Doug Bowser
00:23:50 - Cyberpunk Ups and Downs
00:31:42 - Can we no longer trust CD Project Red? - Best Friends Q:Julian
00:33:45 - Do you think it’s time we see a seismic shift in the way games are developed and/or marketed? - Best Friends Q:Nick F from NY (screw this snow)
00:37:45 - When are we going to start holding game studios/companies to a higher standard when it comes to the quality of their games on Day 1? - Best Friends Q:Koree a.k.a. Xander
00:47:30 -  Ad  
00:50:30 - The Game Awards KILLED Again
00:58:30 - Tidbits?
01:00:10 - Out today
01:02:30 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Imran
